title: How do you takecare of your eyes after studying from a screen all day
content: I feel my eyes burning after studying, since notes and slides  everything is on screen. can't even get those many slides and notes printed. And being a cs student also I have to sit in front of my laptop all day.

comments.body: I use eye drops to prevent dryness and itching, use them twice a day atleast (or whenever required). Also take regular and timely breaks from studying, and make sure when you're on a break from your laptop, you aren't on your phone. (A challenge for your generation, but I know). Taking a break from one screen to be on another screen doesn't solve the problem.
it feels like your spying on us. also, when are you going to evolve ?

Take a break from the screen every 20-30 min. Stroll around. DO NOT rub your eyes.

There is limited research to prove the effectiveness of blue light filters. Just use dark mode on low brightness, that's what I do.
